languages.text: "Пять поколений ткачей охраняли сию реликвию, чтобы она послужила достойнейшему из Домини. Время пришло".
"Five generations of spinners have guarded this relic so that it may serve the worthiest of the Domini. Its time has come."
languages.original_text: "Пять поколений ткачей охраняли сию реликвию, чтобы она послужила достойнейшему из Домини. Время пришло".

traits.locale_text: "Five generations of Weavers have guarded this relic so that it may serve the worthiest of the Enims. Its time has come."
"Five generations of Weavers have guarded this relic so that it may serve the worthiest of the Enims. Its time has come."
"Five generations of weavers have guarded this relic so that it may serve the worthiest of the Enims. Its time has come."
"Five generations of weavers have guarded this relic so that it may serve the worthiest of the Enims. Its time has come."
"Five generations of spinners have guarded this relic so that it may serve the worthiest of the Domini. Its time has come."
"Five generations of spinners have guarded this relic so that it may serve the worthiest of the Domini. Its time has come."

languages.text: "Fünf Generationen von Spinnern haben dieses Relikt bewacht, auf dass es den Würdigsten der Domini dienen kann. Seine Zeit ist gekommen."
languages.original_text: "Five generations of spinners have guarded this relic so that it may serve the worthiest of the Domini. Its time has come."

traits.locale_text: "Fünf Generationen von Spinnern haben dieses Relikt bewacht, auf dass es den Würdigsten der Domini dienen kann. Seine Zeit ist gekommen."

languages.text: «Cinco generaciones de tejedores han protegido esta reliquia para que sirva al más digno de los Domini. Su momento ha llegado».
languages.original_text: "Five generations of spinners have guarded this relic so that it may serve the worthiest of the Domini. Its time has come."

traits.locale_text: «Cinco generaciones de tejedores han protegido esta reliquia para que sirva al más digno de los Domini. Su momento ha llegado».

languages.text: 「この聖遺物は、最も偉大なドミニのお役に立つべく、紡績工が5代にわたって守り続けてきたのです。そして、その時がついに来ました」
languages.original_text: "Five generations of spinners have guarded this relic so that it may serve the worthiest of the Domini. Its time has come."

traits.locale_text: 「この聖遺物は、最も偉大なエニムのお役に立つべく、織り手が5代にわたって守り続けてきたのです。そして、その時がついに来ました」

languages.text: “整整五代织网者前仆后继地守护这件圣物，让它侍奉最为尊贵的秘者。如今，它侍奉的时间到了。”
languages.original_text: "Five generations of spinners have guarded this relic so that it may serve the worthiest of the Domini. Its time has come."

traits.locale_text: “整整五代织网者前仆后继地守护这件圣物，让它侍奉最为尊贵的秘者。如今，它侍奉的时间到了。”

languages.text: « Cinq générations de tisseurs ont veillé sur cette relique pour qu'elle puisse servir le plus digne des Domini. Son heure est venue. »
languages.original_text: "Five generations of spinners have guarded this relic so that it may serve the worthiest of the Domini. Its time has come."

traits.locale_text: « Cinq générations de tisseurs ont veillé sur cette relique pour qu'elle puisse servir le plus digne des Domini. Son heure est venue. »

languages.text: "Dokurlar, en saygın Dominlere hizmet edebilsin diye beş nesildir bu yadigârı koruyor. Artık zamanı geldi."
languages.original_text: "Five generations of spinners have guarded this relic so that it may serve the worthiest of the Domini. Its time has come."
